#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
ll a[10002];
int main()
{
	int t;
	ios::sync_with_stdio(0);
	ll len,n,i,j,tmp;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		cin>>a[i];
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(a[i]==1)
			{
				a[i]=-1;
			}
			else
			a[i]=1;
		}
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cout<<a[i]<<" ";
		}
		cout<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
